Comments on: 25 years HIV/AIDS http://sharing-nicely.net/2006/06/25-years-hivaids/ Philipp Schmidt's shared learnings Mon, 12 Aug 2013 14:10:00 +0000 hourly 1 http://wordpress.org/?v=3.8 By: Abo http://sharing-nicely.net/2006/06/25-years-hivaids/#comment-6 Fri, 06 Feb 2009 15:22:37 +0000 http://bokaap.net/blog/?p=30#comment-6 Hi there

I met in a taxi from Claremont to Khayelitsha in January 2008. Thembi, her boyfriend and I got along like a house on fire in the half an hour we were on the taxi together.

We exchanged numbers and promised to keep in contact. however, i was robbed and lost all contact as my phone and sim card went with the robbers.

When I met them in a cramped back seat of a taxi with four people and their little one that hot summer day, i had no idea who they were and that they were so popular (I think that showed a bit, I dont know).

Please tell her, or preferably her boyfriend Melikhaya to contact Abo on 082 0818 725 anytime. I know that their number starts with 084 and has a recurring number. I cant remember more. They are great people doing great work, and I want to surround myself with such people, because maybe their greatness might rub off on me.
